notes.note: Included past research experimentatal results on program and architecture multi-objective tuning (execution time, code size, compilation time, power consumption) for reproducibility and collaborative extensions
Connected with MILEPOST GCC [$#cm_d76ac3bb9a3f744c_38aa288519b38bf7#$] for continuous and online training and improvement of the prediction models

title: cTuning.org public repository (aka cTuning1)
to: start collaborative systematization of analysis, design and optimization of computer systems based on extensible public repositories of knowledge, crowdsourcing, online tuning and machine learning

urls.title: Online advice web service to predict optimizations based on features
